mapper.sql: SELECT cg_table.id,cg_table.code,cg_table.name,cg_table.title,cg_table.sub_package,cg_table.entity,cg_table.template,cg_table.trial_licence,cg_table.trial_days,cg_table.action_list,cg_table.imports,cg_table.controller_extends,cg_table.pojo_imports,cg_table.pojo_extends,cg_table.pojo_java_code,cg_table.creator,cg_table.flow_dyna_fields_op,cg_table.flow_dyna_fields_cp,cg_table.project_id,cg_project.code AS project,cg_project.group_id AS group_id,cg_project.name AS module FROM cg_table JOIN cg_project ON cg_table.project_id = cg_project.id
mapper.insert:
insert all

mapper.delete: delete from cg_table where id in #{item}
delete from cg_table where cg_table.code = #{code} AND cg_table.project_id = #{projectId}
